sentences.en: " I beg your pardon,'said Rhett with mock humility.
sentences.cn: " 请原谅, "瑞德用假意谦卑的口吻说.

sentences.en: Accept me in the hour of my humility.
sentences.cn: 在我卑屈的时候你收了我吧.

sentences.en: God will help you if you turn to Him in humility and trust.
sentences.cn: 如果你怀着一颗谦恭而信任的心向上帝求助，上帝会帮助你。

sentences.en: Haughtiness invites disaster , humility receives benefit.
He was too simple to wonder when he had attained humility.
sentences.cn: 他心地单纯,不去捉摸自己什么时候达到这样谦卑的地步.

sentences.en: His voice was still soft and filled with specious humility.
sentences.cn: 他的声音还是那么温和,甚至有点谦卑.
谦虚被认为是一种美德。

sentences.en: Humility often gains more than pride.
sentences.cn: 谦逊往往比骄傲收益更多.

sentences.en: I expressed displeasure, with my legendary humility and restraint.
sentences.cn: 我作出了不悦的表情, 我的谦卑克制精神是众所周知的.

sentences.en: I shall take on the work with humility and dedication.
sentences.cn: 我要以谦逊和献身的精神,从事我的工作.

sentences.en: It is not a sign of humility to declaim against pride.
sentences.cn: 慷慨激昂地攻击傲慢,并非谦逊的标志.

sentences.en: She would carry to the grave the memory of his grace and humility at that moment.
sentences.cn: 她就是死了也忘不了他此时此刻表现出来的仁慈和谦卑.

sentences.en: The minister preached a sermon on humility.
sentences.cn: 牧师就谦恭的问题布道.

sentences.en: We come nearest to the great when we are great in humility.
sentences.cn: 当我们是大为谦卑的时候,便是我们最接近伟大的时候.

sentences.en: You are here because you have failed in humility, in self - discipline.
sentences.cn: 你到这里来是因为你不自量力, 不知自重.

trans.tran_cn: 谦逊，谦恭，谦让的行为，谦虚谨慎
trans.tran_en: the quality of not being too proud about yourself – use this to show approval
